content:
Hi everyone,
Here's our current Release 6.7. plan:Â https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse-pm/issues/377

  • Start: 2025-03-12
  • Community PR Last Call: 2024-06-04
  • Core PR Last Call: 2025-06-18
  • Code Freeze: 2025-06-25
  • Release Date: 2025-07-02

As always, dates are approximate.

Questions? Please let me know!
Also, please feel free to drop your questions or 6.7 PR proposals in this thread :)
@Dorothea Iglezakis I already tagged your CodeMeta updates (#11087) as 6.7.

Thanks @Ceilyn Boyd for setting up the goal posts. Just a crazy idea: how about having the community last call on the Hackathon Friday of the DCM? (Basically saying move the dates by a week.) That way anything done during the Hackathon could be included, maybe some stuff is finished etc.
I think the problem is that we're only going to have a few hours of hacking.
Also discussed at #community > #Dataverse2025 @ ğŸ’¬
@Johannes D do you want any of your PRs in 6.7? Here's the list: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pulls/johannes-darms

Phil thanks for asking. This time we only have two PR ready and one close to ready...
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11172 (already in QA)
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/10567 (PID reconcile/move)
and something we are working one
https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/10134 (We are going to create a PR for this issue in april not sure if we can get that one in 6.7)
Thanks. Is #10567 ready for review? Or are you still working on it?

Philip Durbin â˜€ï¸ said:

Thanks. Is #10567 ready for review? Or are you still working on it?

Yes, it'r ready from my side. We just need to rename the command, if needed.
Thanks. I'll take a look at it.
The release notes for Dataverse 6.7 are ready for review: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11613
Hi @Philip Durbin ğŸš€, our team would like to see https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11535 in 6.7 is it possible ?

@luddaniel I probably don't have enough official capacity for a hard no. That said, as far as I know both community PR and core team PR timelines are closed already (see the post by @Ceilyn Boyd above). The only reason why 6.7 isn't released yet is because of certain urgent fixes that needed incorporation... :grimacing: :bomb:
@luddaniel if you'd like, I can throw a 6.8 milestone on it
Done! I saw your :thumbs_up:
Thanks

Philip Durbin ğŸš€ said:

The release notes for Dataverse 6.7 are ready for review: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11613

When is 6.7 going to be released? My mother works with people related to Madrid dataverse instance so she is aware of new release

If nothing important interrupts the process my personal guess is tomorrow is release day. Otherwise early next week. If you want to follow the process, we're at this step right now: https://guides.dataverse.org/en/latest/developers/making-releases.html#prepare-release-branch, see PR https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11641
Done! #community > Dataverse 6.7 is here!
Oliver Bertuch has marked this topic as resolved.

luddaniel said:

Hi Philip Durbin ğŸš€, our team would like to see https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11535 in 6.7 is it possible ?

@luddaniel merged! (For 6.8)
